column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " Come back , Furry - Foot . "
#Text=Kya says : " Hey , Jinora , what are you chasing ? "
#Text=Jinora says : " Nothing . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Focus , Korra .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No talking .
#Text=Feel the energy of the universe .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , I feel it .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , really !
#Text=I 'm trying to concentrate here !
#Text=I do n't think this location is going to work either .
#Text=" Korra says : " What 's going on with you ?
#Text=First , you 're blaming Meelo , then Kya , and now me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well , nothing is feeling right to me .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't want to rush your feelings , but we 're kind of in a hurry .
#Text=How did you first get into the Spirit World ?
#Text=Let 's try that .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well ... actually , I 've never been into the Spirit World .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 've never been into the Spirit World ?
#Text=" Pema says : " But you used to spend days in the temple meditating .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Trying to get in .
#Text=It never happened .
#Text=It 's my greatest shortcoming as an airbender , spiritual leader , and son of Aang .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Welcome to the " I Disappoint Dad " club .
#Text=" Kya says : " If you 've never been to the Spirit World , how were you planning to get Korra into it ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've spent years studying the techniques and theories of ancient spiritual leaders .
#Text=Now that the Avatar needs me , it must be my time .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin , Harmonic Convergence is almost here .
#Text=If Vaatu escapes from the Spirit World — " Tenzin says : " You have to trust me .
#Text=I can help you .
#Text=" Kya says : " There might be another way .
#Text=Jinora , is there something you want to tell Korra ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora ?
#Text=She 's too young and untrained to have any knowledge about spiritual matters .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Actually , I think I do know where Korra needs to go to get into the Spirit World .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " And how would you know that ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " My spirit friends showed me .
#Text=It 's okay .
#Text=You can show yourselves .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " How did you do that ?
#Text=" Pema says : " Jinora .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Bunnies !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Actually , they 're dragonfly bunny spirits .
#Text=" Kya says : " I knew it .
#Text=Looks like she does know something about spiritual matters .
#Text=" Ikki says : " So cute !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Bunnies !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Come back !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " How long have you been able to do this ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I guess I 've always kind of had a connection with spirits .
#Text=" Bumi says : " I think this one likes me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Are they here to help ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I think they want you to go down there .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I do n't know .
#Text=The spiritual energy is historically strongest near the temple .
#Text=" Korra says : " No offense , but I 'm guessing the spirits have actually been to the Spirit World , so I 'm gon na follow them .
#Text=" Bumi says : " If we need to go to the Tenzin World , we 'll call you .
#Text="
